author: kocolosk
msg: - only one instance of given source->target runs at a time
- supervisor restarts replications that terminate abnormally
- pull repl. streams attachments directly to disk
- temporarily rollback parallel async doc GETs during pull rep.
- replication updates show up in Futon Status window

author: markt
msg: Remove jk jni code from Tomcat 7. It is deprecated in mod_jk and will almost certainly have been rmeoved by the time 7.0.x has a stable release.
Shout if I deleted something I shouldn't have.

author: oheger
msg: Removed System.clearProperty() as it was introduced in JDK 1.5.

author: fancy
msg: OPENJPA-965 Open up FinderCacheImpl for non-JDBC or JDBC-like  implementation of preparing statement/query execution
An approache not exposing FinderCacheImpl to jdbc kernel
